column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Zuko , I do n't wan na tell you how to do your job , but why are we heading towards the Earth Kingdom ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Come on slowpokes !
#Text=Faster !
#Text=" Azula says : " Sorry I 'm late , father .
#Text=Good palanquin bearers are so hard to come by these days .
#Text=So , is everything ready for our departure ?
#Text=" Ozai says : " There has been a change of plans , Azula .
#Text=" Azula says : " What ?
#Text=" Ozai says : " I 've decided to lead the fleet of airships to Ba Sing Se alone .
#Text=You will remain here in the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Azula says : " But I thought we were going to do this together .
#Text=" Ozai says : " My decision is final .
#Text=" Azula says : " You ... you ca n't treat me like this !
#Text=You ca n't treat me like Zuko !
#Text=" Ozai says : " Azula , silence yourself .
#Text=" Azula says : " But it was my idea to burn everything to the ground !
#Text=I deserve to be by your side !
#Text=" Ozai says : " Azula !
#Text=Listen to me .
#Text=I need you here to watch over the homeland .
#Text=It 's a very important job that I can only entrust to you .
#Text=" Azula says : " Really ?
#Text=" Ozai says : " And for your loyalty , I 've decided to declare you the new Fire Lord .
#Text=" Azula says : " Fire Lord Azula ?
#Text=It does seem appropriate , but what about you ?
#Text=" Ozai says : " Fire Lord Ozai is no more .
#Text=Just as the world will be reborn in fire , I shall be reborn as the supreme ruler of the world .
#Text=From this moment on , I will be known as ... the Phoenix King .
#Text=" Katara says : " And the reason you 've brought us to a seedy Earth Kingdom tavern is what now ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " June .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh yeah , that weird bounty hunter with the giant mole .
#Text=" Suki says : " Mole ?
#Text=Her skin is flawless .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , she has this giant mole creature she rides around on .
#Text=" Zuko says : " The shirshu .
#Text=It 's the only animal that can track Aang 's scent anywhere in the world .
#Text=It 's the one shot we have of finding him .
#Text=" Toph says : " I do n't know who this June lady is , but I like her .
#Text="
